bioconda.name: bioconductor-farms
bioconda.summary: FARMS - Factor Analysis for Robust Microarray Summarization

biotools.summary: The package provides the summarization algorithm called Factor Analysis for Robust Microarray Summarization and a novel unsupervised feature selection criterion called "I/NI-calls".

bioschemas.name: farms
bioschemas.summary: The package provides the summarization algorithm called Factor Analysis for Robust Microarray Summarization and a novel unsupervised feature selection criterion called "I/NI-calls".
